name: Trapped in a bubble
description:
Trapped in a bubble is a 2d local coop space shooter. 2 players are trapped inside a bubble with their spaceships. If one of the players gets hit, the bubble shrinks. Stay alive as long as you can, while sharing the space inside your bubble wisely.

This game was created during the GMTK GameJam 2021 with the theme Joint together.

Game Art + Sound by
Kenney

Music by
Tours - Enthusiast

Created by
Gollum2142 (Pascal B.)
maX!mum (Max N.)
